thread.title: Beautiful hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel in great location - Review of Park Hyatt New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aripov
title: Beautiful hotel in great location
text: Unfortunately I don't remember the exact date I stayed at the hotel last month. The room was fabulous. Very short stay only two days. Horrible service during breakfast, I waited 45 minutes for food and even they they didn't bring everything. Told that at the check out, just got sorry about that. Definitely a last visit to this hotel.
